attributes.action: Investigate the 7th July Bombings of london
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are too many inconsistances in the "official" story.
Lets have a full and thorough investigation in to what happened. Especially as there was a training exercise on the same day for the same targets.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
